    • About Sharad Gupta


    Real Estate Sales Team with over 15 years of diversified experience in real estate sales, property development, and business consulting. With a keen eye to spot real estate opportunities and natural aptitude for building trusted business partnerships, we have helped hundreds of families build Real Estate Wealth.

    When you list your home with us, Your Home is Sold Guaranteed or We’ll Buy It. Your home will sell for more money, in less time and for the least amount of hassle. We sell 48% more homes than any other average real estate agent in the area. Our homes sell for an average of 7.3% higher than list price and in 14.2% less time than average. We Beat Every Redfin Rebate. If you do not like the home you purchase through us and in the next 6 months, we will either buy it back or sell it back in the market for zero cost to you. Our Service is Guaranteed and there are no fixed contracts. If you do not like our services at any time, you can fire us. No questions asked. Zero Risk and No Obligation. Call Now & Start Your Packing. No Hassle. No Gimmicks. Check out our Reviews. Some conditions apply.
